documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
.  Cutting off Joe’s head and then holding his head under water for ten min-
utes is a sufficient condition for killing him.
Indicate whether the following principles are true or false and why.
1.  If having feature Fis a sufficientcondition for having feature G,then
having feature Gis a necessarycondition for having feature F.
2.  If having feature Fis a sufficientcondition for having feature G,then
lacking feature Fis a necessarycondition for lacking feature G.
3.  If lacking feature Fis a suf
